Title: Dracothian Guard Fulminators (Single)
Legend: Fulminators are the most aggressive Dracothian Guard, the vaunted speartip of the Lightning echelon. As their ground-shaking charge builds speed, a tempest of energy surrounds their lances, ready to be unleashed as they crash home.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single. You can include 1 unit of this type for each Lord-Celestant on Dracoth you include in your army. This unit cannot have the Battleline battlefield role.

Intro: Each model in a Dracothian Guard Fulminators unit is armed with a Stormstrike Glaive.

Rules.Name: Elite
Rules.Rule: ELITE: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dracoths are each armed with a Stormblast and Claws and Fangs.

Rules.Name: Stormblast
Rules.Fluff: Dracoths can unleash the power of Sigmar’s storm from within their maws.
Rules.Rule: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Stormblast. Instead, roll a dice. On a 4+, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Impaling Strikes
Rules.Fluff: On the charge, the blade of a stormstrike glaive can impale several foes.
Rules.Rule: This unit’s Stormstrike Glaives have a Damage characteristic of 3 instead of 1 if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.
